Html:
Hi evreryone....

I'm writing a playlist manager for one of my media player... and i've a questione: How can i have and set the information of an audio file?

Example (examplesong.mp3):

The title is: examplesong

The autor is: Me

how can i have this information.... how can i change it if i want?

Please help me! thanks in advance!
I was trying to do the same...but apparently nobody answers this.
this isn't really something NAudio has much support for. For MP3 files, taglibsharp is supposed to be very good. You can also often get information from the IShellDispatch4 from Shell32.
